titles.title: Household Water Conservation Challenge Act of 2007
Household Water Conservation Challenge Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a credit against income tax for home water conservation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Household Water Conservation Challenge Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers a tax credit for reducing water usage in their residences.
